item.description:
8-9 Very basic beginner lesson. Got two left feet? Don't worry - just show up and Liz and Seth will take care of the rest!
9-12:30 Enjoy live music, snacks, coffee, and friendly people. Dance or just watch. Liz and the other "Veterans" will be happy to show you new swing moves!

http://www.youwanttod...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be teaching the beginner lesson with my awesome partner, Seth, and then flitting about the room, dancing and welcoming folks.
item.why: If you ask any swing dancer in the area, they will tell you that Blues Cafe is the best swing dance event because it has: 1. beautiful atmosphere, great floor, free snacks/ coffee 2. inspiring, danceable live music 3. friendly folks/ positive vibe

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Blues Cafe and Dance - Swing dance, or just watch. NO PARTNER REQUIRED.
